name: Introduction to C Programming
details: Learn the fundamentals of C programming, including variables, control structures, and functions in this beginner-friendly course.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Dive into the world of algorithms, mastering their design and analysis with a focus on efficient problem-solving techniques.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Explore C++ in-depth for Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) with a course that combines sleek design and powerful concepts.

name: Basic Data Structures
details: Build a strong foundation in data structures, covering arrays, linked lists, and trees, to excel in computer science.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Delve into Python's Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), harnessing cutting-edge technology to create versatile, efficient programs.

name: Software Engineering
details: Master the art of Software Engineering, gaining expertise in developing, maintaining, and optimizing software systems.

name: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing, achieving a balance of affordability and feature-rich cloud solutions.

name: Database (MySQL)
details: Become a MySQL professional, learning the ins and outs of this powerful database system for efficient data management.

name: Problem-Solving Part
details: Enhance your problem-solving skills, applying versatile techniques to tackle various challenges in diverse contexts.
